ISSUE.TITLE: Column values become blank after naming the column that is in sort list
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Create a table ``TableA`` 2. Create a column ``order`` with Number type 3. Input something. See Screenshot 1. 4. Add a sort option on ``order``. See Screenshot 2. 5. Rename ``order`` to ``order2`` 6. The data under ``order2`` becomes blank. See Screenshot 3. P.S. It affects both GQL / REST projects. Renaming back to ``order`` or removing the filter would resolve the problem but we need better handling here. **Expected behavior** A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. **Screenshots** Screenshot 1: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35857179/145811140-8b3db28b-f4da-4ecd-88ab-951e5a3b0182.png) Screenshot 2: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35857179/145811240-603c911d-e373-4dce-a5f7-d319e1def08f.png) Screenshot 3: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35857179/145811268-7730841d-f252-48b1-868e-e960afb3e24d.png) Node: **v14.18.0** Arch: **x64** Platform: **darwin** Docker: **false** Database: **sqlite3** ProjectOnRootDB: **true** RootDB: **sqlite3** PackageVersion: **0.83.5**
